p: The environmental conditions used, and the period of the experiments, proved to be appropriate and sufficient for the development and reproduction of the nematodes. The results showed that there was no reproduction of M. chitwoodi in S. linnaeanum and that there was only a little reproduction in S. sisymbriifolium cv. Sis 6001, when compared with the reproduction in the susceptible plants used as controls, tomato cv. Coração de boi and potato cv. Désirée (Fig. 1 and Supplementary Fig. S1).
